definition: the act of propelling with force, begin with vigor
details:
noun
- the act of propelling with force
= synonyms: launching
- a motorboat with an open deck or a half deck
verb
- begin with vigor
= example: begin with vigor
= synonyms: plunge
- smoothen the surface of
= example: smoothen the surface of
- propel with force
= example: propel with force
- get going
= synonyms: set in motion
- launch for the first time
= example: launch for the first time
- set up or found
= synonyms: found, set up, establish
